summary: Test suite that validates the downloading of AI model bundles from multiple sources (MONAI hosting, NGC, GitHub, HuggingFace Hub, generic URLs), checks version information and latest releases, verifies large file HTTP download handling, and tests loading utilities for TypeScript modules and model weight files with optional network overrides.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the MONAI bundle download mechanisms across various repositories and file sizes, and ensure proper loading of model configurations and weights for downstream medical imaging applications.
